attributes.action: Seriously look at European Union withdrawal.
attributes.additional_details:
People say this will harm our trade. The UK is a trade trade deficit country which IMPORTS far more than it exports from Europe. Does Germany suddenly want to stop selling cars to the UK.  Of course not trade will still continue just as it has always done. Does EDF a French government owned company want to lose Billions of Euros of nuclear contacts in the UK . EUROPEAN companies get billions of pounds of trade a year from the UK any loss of trade would be to Europes detriment. A free trade agreement would be easy to get from the EU. It is a scare story put around by pro europe politicians and newspapers.
Clegg says we would get listenened to more in the EU
but the EU will not even listen to the UK's views on taxation, immigration etc.
